member.name: T:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions
member.summary: Methods that extend known Unity objects and allow to directly create and control tweens from their instances. These, as all DOTween43 methods, require Unity 4.3 or later.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOColor(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer,UnityEngine.Color,System.Single)
member.summary: Tweens a SpriteRenderer's color to the given value. Also stores the spriteRenderer as the tween's target so it can be used for filtered operations

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOFade(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Tweens a Material's alpha color to the given value. Also stores the spriteRenderer as the tween's target so it can be used for filtered operations

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOMove(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D,UnityEngine.Vector2,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tweens a Rigidbody2D's position to the given value. Also stores the Rigidbody2D as the tween's target so it can be used for filtered operations
member.param: If TRUE the tween will smoothly snap all values to integers

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOMoveX(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tweens a Rigidbody2D's X position to the given value. Also stores the Rigidbody2D as the tween's target so it can be used for filtered operations
member.param: If TRUE the tween will smoothly snap all values to integers

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOMoveY(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Tweens a Rigidbody2D's Y position to the given value. Also stores the Rigidbody2D as the tween's target so it can be used for filtered operations
member.param: If TRUE the tween will smoothly snap all values to integers

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DORotate(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Tweens a Rigidbody2D's rotation to the given value. Also stores the Rigidbody2D as the tween's target so it can be used for filtered operations

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOKill(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer)
member.summary: Kills all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens killed.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOKill(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D)
member.summary: Kills all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens killed.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOFlip(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer)
member.summary: Flips the direction (backwards if it was going forward or viceversa) of all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens flipped.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOFlip(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D)
member.summary: Flips the direction (backwards if it was going forward or viceversa) of all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens flipped.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOGoto(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends to the given position all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens involved.
member.param: Time position to reach (if higher than the whole tween duration the tween will simply reach its end)
If TRUE will play the tween after reaching the given position, otherwise it will pause it

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOGoto(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends to the given position all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens involved.
member.param: Time position to reach (if higher than the whole tween duration the tween will simply reach its end)
If TRUE will play the tween after reaching the given position, otherwise it will pause it

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOPause(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer)
member.summary: Pauses all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens paused.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOPause(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D)
member.summary: Pauses all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens paused.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOPlay(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer)
member.summary: Plays all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens played.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOPlay(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D)
member.summary: Plays all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens played.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOPlayBackwards(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer)
member.summary: Plays backwards all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens played.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOPlayBackwards(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D)
member.summary: Plays backwards all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens played.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOPlayForward(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer)
member.summary: Plays forward all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens played.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOPlayForward(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D)
member.summary: Plays forward all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens played.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DORestart(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer)
member.summary: Restarts all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens restarted.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DORestart(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D)
member.summary: Restarts all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens restarted.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DORewind(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer)
member.summary: Rewinds all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens rewinded.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DORewind(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D)
member.summary: Rewinds all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens rewinded.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOTogglePause(UnityEngine.SpriteRenderer)
member.summary: Toggles the paused state (plays if it was paused, pauses if it was playing) of all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens involved.

member.name: M:DG.Tweening.ShortcutExtensions.DOTogglePause(UnityEngine.Rigidbody2D)
member.summary: Toggles the paused state (plays if it was paused, pauses if it was playing) of all tweens that have this target as a reference (meaning tweens that were started from this target, or that had this target added as an Id) and returns the total number of tweens involved.
